stories.text:
So my vacation plans fell through, I was supposed to travel but because of COVID, I've had to cancel. Which means I have 3 weeks to do absolutely nothing. I want to occupy myself. I'm not much of an idea guy, but am a seasoned engineer.

I want to work on building either an API or a dataset. Any field, the only requirement is that is it be useful to someone or some people.

So if you have any ideas on what might be worthwhile or useful to work on.. or even just lots of fun, please let me know. I have way too much time on my hands. Thanks.
stories.title: Ask HN: I'm looking for ideas for API or dataset projects to build on vacation
ThinkPad X1 Nano G2 32GB RAM and communication bar with four 360 mic array
Revitalizing batteries by bringing ‘dead’ lithium back to life
Ask HN: Why are so many Americans remaining unmarried in their 30's and 40's?
Mild Covid-19 Can Trigger Self-Attacking Antibodies
Fix broken systems, Repair human damage

stories.text: When i'm under work stress looking at same sex sometimes i get these thoughts because of this stress/anxiety goes up and i will have panic attacks,i'm straight guy who is intrested in only girls these thougths started some 2 years back when i'm bullied by some team members becuase of my shyness i was not opening up with the other colleagues who happens to be all the girls. from that time on these thoughts are blockmailing me any suggestions to this innocent boy.Thanks
stories.title: How did you get rid of sexual obsessive thoughts?
